name: PowerCenter:Avoid using field-level stored procedure
description: List all field of transformation calling stored procedure
output:
This report lists all Mappings, Mapplets and Folders with Transformations having field calling stored procedure.
it provides the following information
Mapping or Mapplet or Folder full name, Field full name
rationale: For understandability and performance, try to avoid use of field-level stored procedure. When you use a connected stored procedure in a mapping, you have a call to the database for each source row data. If there is a large number of rows this could have a very strong impact on performance.
remediation:
Whenever possible try to to use native PowerCenter transformation. 
If a StoredProcedure is necessary try to minimise database calls, try to use conditional expression with unconnected Stored Procedure.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
